name: Lifebuoy Ayurveda Care Shampoo
description: Experience the power of Ayurveda with Lifebuoy Ayurveda Care Pancharatna Shampoo. This shampoo contains 5 authentic ayurvedic ingredients (Seenidda, Aralu, Nelli, Aritha, Kikiridiya)  The power of this Ayurvedic formula will give you strong and healthy hair.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
